item.title: Graduate Research Student Toolkit
item.description: An unusually composed graduate student Graduate Research Life If you’ve stubled onto this page, chances are that you’ve recently embarked on your graduate research programme or are somewhere along in your research studies! For this, I applaud your ambition and zeal! Which you fell for… Expectation vs. Reality Chances are that if (Destination Dissertation) Complex vs Complicated - Credit: http://scotthutcheson.squarespace.com/journal/2019/2/2/complex-or-complicated.
